message.translation: While in the air, press <KC ATTACK1>

message.original: <PADM><KC ATTACK2>を押し、左スティックを倒して３属性を選択<KEYM><KC ATTACK2>を押し、マウス移動で３属性を選択</KEYM> <PADM><KC ATTACK2>を押して属性決定<KEYM><KC ATTACK1>または<KC ATTACK2>を押して属性決定
message.translation: <PADM>Press <KC ATTACK2>, then move the left stick and select from three elemental attributes. <KEYM>Press <KC ATTACK2>, then move the mouse and select from three elemental attributes.</KEYM> <PADM>Press <KC ATTACK2> to confirm Element selection.< <KEYM>Press <KC ATTACK1> or <KC ATTACK2> to confirm Element selection.

message.original: <PADM><KC ATTACK2>を押し、左スティックを倒して５属性を選択<KEYM><KC ATTACK2>を押し、マウス移動で５属性を選択</KEYM> <PADM><KC ATTACK2>を押して属性決定<KEYM><KC ATTACK1>または<KC ATTACK2>を押して属性決定
message.translation: <PADM>Press <KC ATTACK2>, then move the left stick and select from five elemental attributes. <KEYM>Press <KC ATTACK2>, then move the mouse and select from five elemental attributes.</KEYM> <PADM>Press <KC ATTACK2> to confirm Element selection.< <KEYM>Press <KC ATTACK1> or <KC ATTACK2> to confirm Element selection.

message.original: 敵の攻撃を受ける（スキル発動中を除く）
message.translation: Block an enemy's attack (except when using skills).

message.original: 敵の攻撃を引きつけて<KC WEAPON_SUB>を押す
message.translation: Press <KC WEAPON_SUB> as an enemy strikes.

message.original: 敵の攻撃を防いだ直後、<PADM>左スティックを素早く後方から前方で反撃、前方から後方で後退<KEYM><KC MOVE_FORWARD>を素早く２回押すと反撃、<KC MOVE_BACKWARD>を素早く２回押すと後退</KEYM>
message.translation: Immediately after guarding against an enemy attack, <PADM>Quickly tap the left stick backwards to retreat. <KEYM>Quickly tap <KC MOVE_FORWARD> twice to strike、 and quickly tap <KC MOVE_BACKWARD> twice to retreat.</KEYM>

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す
message.translation: While climbing an enemy, press <KC ATTACK1>
